meanings.definition: A bus powered by electricity from overhead wires.
meanings.sent1: The trolleybus glided silently along the street.
meanings.sent2: I took the trolleybus to work every day.
meanings.sent3: The trolleybus driver joked that the wires above were tickling the bus.
meanings.sent4: The trolleybus hummed like a giant electric bee.
meanings.sent5: The trolleybus's connection to the wires above made it look like a futuristic vehicle.

meanings.definition: A vehicle that runs on tracks and is powered by electricity from overhead wires.
meanings.sent1: People lined up to board the trolleybus at the station.
meanings.sent2: The trolleybus smoothly followed the tracks through the city.
meanings.sent3: The trolleybus and the tram had a race to see who was faster.
meanings.sent4: The trolleybus moved along the wires like a graceful dancer.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the trolleybus moving effortlessly on its tracks was mesmerizing.
